short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare different AllTrails trips and pick the one you want to do.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compare different AllTrails trips and pick the one you want to do! Add hikes you are considering using the extension or right from the AllTrails page. The app will show you a convenient overview of all saved trails including key data such as distance, elevation & duration, and keeps your trail-searching journey organized - no more need to keep dozens of tabs open!
